text: Fegerl in 2016 Stefan Fegerl (born September 12, 1988) is an Austrian table tennis player. He competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in the men's singles event, in which he was eliminated in the third round by Koki Niwa, and as part of the Austrian team in the men's team event. ==References== Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Austrian male table tennis players Category:Olympic table tennis players of Austria Category:Table tennis players at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:European Games competitors for Austria Category:Table tennis players at the 2015 European Games Category:European Games medalists in table tennis Category:European Games bronze medalists for Austria Category:Table tennis players at the 2019 European Games
title: Stefan Fegerl
